DOC.detailed_description: Sample Collection : Urine sample use study collect immediately prior urological evaluation procedure store -80 oC . Urine sample send sponsor remain -80o C analysis . Clinical Data Collection : All subject clinical information record form section 9.3 . Enrollment Checklist Case Report Form ( CRF ) . Information regard history hematuria urine cytology record . In addition , non-identifying information include age , sex , race , smoke history , alcohol consumption , occupational exposure chemical dye , history urologic disorder disease , history irritative voiding symptom , history urinary tract infection , history pelvic irradiation , analgesic abuse record . The Investigators also ask provide information subject ' medical record one ( 1 ) year enrollment sample collection . In particular , diagnosis TCC , malignant disease , non-malignant urogenital condition provide .
